sub_title: MSc in Industrial Ecology at TU Delft and Leiden University | CCUS | Decarbonisation | Climate Finance
summary:
I recently graduated from TU Delft and Leiden University’s MSc in Industrial Ecology program, where I learned to apply interdisciplinary and systemic approaches to analyze and optimize the environmental performance of products, processes, and systems.

My aptitude lies in Life Cycle Assessments (LCA) and impact assessment techniques, which have not only equipped me with analytical prowess but also polished my presentation and communication abilities. I've put these skills to the test as a student consultant, working with a diverse array of clients. Additionally, my involvement in various social impact initiatives has further enriched my skill set.

Previously, I co-founded RevClime, a carbon capture, utilization, and storage (CCUS) based startup that aimed to make CO2 utilization profitable. We won the Shell Energy Transition Award and were finalists in the Cleantech Challenge Netherlands in 2022. Over the duration of the Master’s program, I have developed a keen interest in decarbonization and climate finance. Through my professional experiences, I have had the opportunity to collaborate with diverse stakeholders to foster innovation and impact.

I am passionate about transforming carbon-intensive industries into sustainable sectors and meeting new people who share my vision. I’m currently seeking a role where I can apply my skills and contribute to the transition towards a low-carbon and circular economy. Let’s connect!

education.degree_name: Post Graduate Diploma in Urban Environmental Management and Law

awards.title: Representative, World Student Environmental Summit
awards.description: Represented the Executive Board at World Student Environmental Network's Global Summit held at Doshisha University, Japan.

awards.title: Participant, Green Energy Summit 2018
awards.description: Participated as a student delegate at Shaastra - Indian Institute of Technology - Madras' Annual Technical Fest. The theme of the summit focused on sustainable energy technologies. The summit gave me the opportunity to learn about the complications India faces with respect to renewable power generation and how efficient green energy policies can do their part in removing some of the obstacles the nation currently faces.

awards.title: Participant, International Accessibility Summit, 2017
awards.description: Participated in the International Accessibility Summit of Shaastra 2017, IIT Madras, The summit was a platform for multiple stakeholders in the field of Accessibility and Assistive Technology to come together and share their knowledge. It gave me perspective from various fields of study to ideate on how to make India truly accessible.
awards.issuer: Shaastra, Indian Institute of Technology, Madras

awards.title: Participant, Pragyan Youth Summit 2018
awards.description: Participated in Pragyan Youth Summit 2018, NIT Trichy's annual technical fest. The summit provided insight on how technologies like AI/IoT play an important role in developing Smarter Cities in India. The summit also focused on informing student delegations about the pillars of comprehensive development - institutional, physical, social and economic infrastructure needed to enable the growth of sustainable ecosystems in our cities.

awards.title: Participant, Pragyan Youth Summit 2017
awards.description: Participated as a delegate in NIT-Trichy's Tech Summit - Pragyan. The summit addressed the challenges around innovation in India and helped provide solutions to accelerate innovative Indian technologies into the global markets.The summit was a platform for student delegations to be encouraged about the importance of innovation and to be able to redefine conventions for ourselves.

awards.title: Participant, World Student Environmental Summit
awards.description: Represented SRM Institute of Science and Technology at the World Student Environmental Summit held at University of Sussex and Keele University in 2016.

awards.title: Zonal Level Winners
awards.description: As a part of a team of four, we were declared the Zonal Level Winner at the Robotics Workshop organised by Robosapien Technologies at SRM Institute of Science and Technology.

awards.title: Water Conservation Practises, Interact Club, 2013
awards.description: Part of the team from Chennai selected to tour Jaipur on the premise of Water Conservation Practises during my tenure at Interact Club in the year 2013.

awards.title: Rotary Youth Leadership Awards
awards.description: Won the Best Team, Best Team Leader and the Best Communicator Award at the Rotary Youth Leadership Awards in 2012.

awards.title: Republic Day Camp, NCC Contingent - Tamil Nadu
awards.description: Was part of Junior Wing (JW) representing Tamil Nadu Contingent at the Republic Day Camp during the year 2010-2011. At the camp, I was selected to be a part of National Cultural Team, 2011.

certifications.name: Cities and the Challenge of Sustainable Development

projects.title: Effect of Kinase Inhibitors on Cellular Dysfunction
projects.description: Under the guidance of Dr. Kanchana, Department of Biotechnology, I was a part of a team of three, where I estimated the role of Nifedipine in restoring cellular function by measuring the effect of BH4-BH2 levels, measuring levels of Nitrite-Nitrate levels, evaluating the effect of NAD+ activity and measuring the total antioxidant level on DAHP treated cells.

contributors.headline: MSc in Industrial Ecology at TU Delft and Leiden University | CCUS | Decarbonisation | Climate Finance

projects.title: Nano-Sorbents - Graphene Oxide Nanoparticles
projects.description: Synthesized Graphene Oxide nanoparticles using Modified-Hummer Offeman's Method and optimized the time and concentration of absorption of organic dyes - Cationic (Methylene Blue) and Anionic (Methyl Orange) using prepared Graphene Oxide particles.

contributors.headline: MSc in Industrial Ecology at TU Delft and Leiden University | CCUS | Decarbonisation | Climate Finance

projects.title: Biotransformation of Fructose Dehydrated Product
projects.description: The objective of this study was to optimise various parameters by fungi mediated transformation of 5-hydroxymethylfurfural. 5-HMF is an important platform chemical which has diverse uses as a raw material in the production of chemicals, biofuels and polymers. I was a part of a team of six, where I was involved in analysing activities of Laccase, Lignin Peroxidase, Manganese Peroxidase, Aryl Alcohol Oxidase, Protein Concentration and Reducing Sugar Concentration.

contributors.headline: MSc in Industrial Ecology at TU Delft and Leiden University | CCUS | Decarbonisation | Climate Finance

projects.title: Training in Analytical Methods, Techniques and Instruments
projects.description: Was trained in the preparation of solutions (standards, stock, saturated, solutions of acids etc), preparation of commonly used buffers in environmental biochemistry, bacterial cell culture techniques, preparative and analytical centrifugation, mass spectrometric techniques, electrometric techniques, chromatographic techniques and spectrophotometric techniques under the supervision of Dr Ramani and Dr Radha, Biomolecules and Bio-catalysis Laboratory, Department of Biotechnology, SRM Institute of Science and Technology.

contributors.headline: MSc in Industrial Ecology at TU Delft and Leiden University | CCUS | Decarbonisation | Climate Finance

projects.title: Basic Techniques in Microbiology Laboratory - Implant Training
projects.description: Was trained in safety guidelines and risk assessment as part of good microbiological laboratory practice. Was also introduced to Media, Sterilisation, and Disinfection procedures during my tenure at LifeTeck Research Centre.

contributors.headline: MSc in Industrial Ecology at TU Delft and Leiden University | CCUS | Decarbonisation | Climate Finance

projects.title: Experiments on Development and Application of Piezoelectric Crystals
projects.description: Under the mentorship of Dr. T S Natarajan, Department of Physics, IIT-Madras, I was one of the two member team that synthesized Rochelle Salt (Potassium Sodium Tartrate) and measured the peak to peak voltage using an oscilloscope and the same keeping force as a constant using slotted weights.

profile_positions.description:
1. Impact Assessment Tool: Developed impact assessment tool for adaptation and resilience startups as part of the Adaptation and Resilience ClimAccelerator program organized by Climate-KIC.

2. Adaptation and Resilience Impact Frameworks: Tool designed in accordance with the Triple Bottom Line, Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), B-Corp, and related adaptation and resilience-focused impact measurement frameworks.

3. Impact Workshop: Organized impact workshop for East African startups as part of the Adaptation and Resilience ClimAccelerator program.

profile_positions.title: Sustainability Consultant

profile_positions.description:
1. Climate Change Report: Co-authored study focusing on mitigating the effects of climate change in India involving 100+ climate actors. 
2. Climate Capital Network: Maintained and strengthened the Green Artha proprietary databases used to establish the Climate Capital Network, a group of 50+ climate capital allocators from various sectors, stages, and capital instruments (equity, debt, and grants) across the climate innovation spectrum in India. 
3. Terra.do Fellowship Program: Developed a fellowship program for Terra.do students that included climate-oriented enterprises in India from the ecosystem, last mile, and research sectors.
profile_positions.title: Ecosystem and Capital Support Fellow

profile_positions.description:

and community-driven innovation in the environmental and energy sector in Chennai,
Tamil Nadu, India.

LinkedIn, Instagram.

profile_positions.title: Content and Design Manager

profile_positions.description:
(a) Indoor Air Purifier Project: Mapped indoor air pollutant levels in Indian cities, mapped and visualised absorption capacity of available bio-based indoor air purifiers, presented a report on how the conventional and natural air purifiers meet the indoor air pollution standards sustainably.

(b) Lignite Utilisation for Power/Fuels - Pre-feasibility Study: Contributed in creating process flows, presentations and data visuals.
profile_positions.title: Research Analyst

profile_positions.description:
1. Helped clients (Apartment Communities) understand what would work best for them in terms of the rooftop solar systems present in the market.

2. Increased sales territory by 50% and also presented customized proposals to the residential associations.

3. Designed rooftop solar systems models using Sketch Up given the implementation and design constraints.

4. Summarised the applicable rooftop solar policies of different regions in India and trained the interns in mapping proposals, sales pitches, and financial models of the company.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Executive

volunteer_experiences.description: As part of WSEN's Executive Board, I was responsible for the organization's strategic discussions, and priorities for developing existing and new partnerships.

- Part of U&I Teach Program in U&I Chennai. U&I Teach invests in children from underprivileged backgrounds with courses in English, Math, Science and Social Studies. 
- I was involved in managing student volunteers who took courses in English for students aged between 7-13 years old. 
- Under this umbrella, we also run a 360 degree Program where children are given a holistic education through science camps, field trips, art workshops and career building workshops, in order to build their confidence.

- Elected as the Regional Representative for Asia during WSEN's Global Summit held in University of Sussex and Keele University, 2016. 
- Also served as the support group coordinator for summit support group, communications and external liaisons. 
- I was managing the working groups, monitoring their progress and being the focal point between the working groups and the rest of the Executive Board.

- Project LEAP is a planned and innovative intervention aimed at providing a wholesome learning and growing environment to 4th and 5th grade students.
- Part of the Academic Team, Project LEAP, where I was involved in developing innovative curriculum related to art, dance, music, sports and drama.

- Part of the delivery team in Incoming Global Volunteers in Chennai. Helped interns (part of social projects in different NGOs in Chennai) overcome cultural challenges and expand their experiences in the city of Chennai. 
- Was also part of the expansions team, where my role was to help expand the roles of AIESEC in Chennai in Pondicherry.
